A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars movie of all time. Filled with unnecessary side stories that bring no value to character arcs. Everything in the movie was a joke\, literally\, so all anticipation was removed... there wasn't a single 'ah-hah or damn that was badass\" scene in the entire movie. I found myself saying \"oh you gotta be kidding me\" more than anything else. Idk what else to say other than I'm disappointed. I don't think this is recoverable. None of the original cast is alive anymore outside of chewy.
